sourcesContent:
import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components'; 

export const lightTheme = {
    body: "#FFF",
    fontColor: "#000",
    logoStrip: "linear-gradient(to right, #337BD2, #A6C9F3)",
    mainTextColor: "black",
    secondaryTextColor: "gray",
    tertiaryTextColor: "snow",
    mainBackgroundColor: "snow",
    secondaryBackgroundColor: "#ECECEC;",
    mainBorder: "lightgray",
    background4: "#333333",
    background5: "#ECECEC",
    navHover: "black",
}

export const darkTheme = {
    body: "#000",
    fontColor: "#FFF",
    logoStrip: "linear-gradient(to right, #092D54, #1D508F)",
    mainTextColor: "#EBEBEB",
    secondaryTextColor: "#EBEBEB",
    tertiaryTextColor: "#EBEBEB",
    mainBackgroundColor: "#363636",
    secondaryBackgroundColor: "#1b1b1b;",
    mainBorder: "black",
    background4: "#1b1b1b",
    background5: "#565656",
    navHover: "black",
}

export const GlobalStyles = createGlobalStyle`

    body {
        background-color: ${props => props.theme.body};
    }

`;
